attributes.action: Legalising medical and recreational use of marijuana only at your home
attributes.additional_details:
It would be beneficial for everyone even the government, it would mean society is happy and people with chronic illnesses can relieve pain , and the government can get tax from it, 

Thank you thats all
attributes.background:
Most of the uk want marijuana to legal,  it has many heath Benefits if the right amount is smoked, it reduces anxiety, helps with chronic illnesses, and boosts mood, 
There are many more benefits that science has shown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575625
